description: 2016 pilot of Wi-Fi data collection - a review of the TfL WiFi pilot data collection study that ran from November to December 2016

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["We ran a four-week pilot between November and December 2016 to study how depersonalised Wi-Fi connection data from customers' mobile devices could be used to better understand how people navigate the London Underground network."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
